businesses.name: Heinold's First And Last Chance Saloon

reviews.text_excerpt:
I sat in a bar where Jack London did his homework. 

Oakland history is alive right here!

Are you looking for an interesting bar that you can tell friends about for years to come?  Look no further. 

I happened upon this bar one fateful Sunday...

Fantastic place. It's obvious that 99% of the reviewers love this place, and for good reason.

It's a piece of history that's still alive.
